interface.name: org.alljoyn.SmartSpaces.Operation.FilterStatus
interface.description: Interface for determining the status of filters

property.name: FilterInfo
property.description: Holds static information about the filter

property.name: IsCleanable
property.description: This is a static property of the filter. If the property is true a new filter does not need to be ordered, just clean.

property.name: FilterLifespanDays
property.description: Day a new filter will last. Used to convert percentage into days remaining. If -1 there is no predicted life. If 0 the life is less than 1 day

property.name: FilterLifeRemaining
property.description: Lifespan Remaining in percentage (100 - 0). 0 indicates replace/clean. OrderPercent indicates order. A simple device may just implement 100/0 or 100/OrderPercent/0 instead of implementing the entire range of values

method.name: GetFilterDescription
method.description: Get descriptive information about filter. It is possible no information is provided as output (i.e. empty string is returned).

arg.name: languageTag
arg.description: Language to be used in the output strings

struct.name: FilterData
struct.description: GStatic property provides the filter ordering information. Url can be just a domain or a complete URL to the exact filter. Any portion may be blank.
